page.title: 17A Typical Family In Oxted
page.content: My family is a typical one living in {S.E. England in 1985.}Like many famil- ies in Oxted we have come here from elsewhere, in our case from Wales. We have{4}in our family which is about average. My parents both work. Mum is a teacher locally, & Dad works in the head_office of a bank in London. Like most Dads he travels out of Oxted to work. In Oxted there are plenty of {leisure opportunities. }Most families join in local sports and leisures. My house is not far from these facilit- ies. We live just opposite the {Middle {School} where my brother and I go to learn. There is is also a First School for young children. Most families in Oxted have a refrigerator , washing- machine , cooker , 1 or 2 cars , & a television set. Many families now have computers, videos, stereos, & micro- wave ovens. {By Elin Davies, aged 11.
